name: Hobgoblins and Harmony
description:
Hobgoblins and Harmony is a online co-op narrative driven, card game where you take on the task of defeating the Hobgoblin King. Throughout your journey you will be accompanied by your fellow adventurer and player. You will find a constant companion in the snarky and ill-mannered narrator. 

Build friendships one card at a time and tackle challenges like isolation, internal and external conflicts and the Hobgoblin King's horde. 

But keep your eyes peeled and be on your toes, not everything is as it seems and challenges are around every corner. 




For the complete experience players are advised to play in full screen.
